symbols.description: Number of choices each round eg. (rock 1, paper 2, scissors 3, ...).

steps.description: Maximum number of rounds the environment can run. Total is this number -1.

last_opponent_action.description: Symbol returned by your opponent last round. None on the first turn.

last_winner.description: Winner of the last round. None on the first round.

action.description: Choice of weapon for the round. (Rock = 1, Paper = 2, Scissors = 3, etc)
